alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Putnam; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Warren, east central Putnam, northern Hancock, southeastern Greene, Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Norman to near Sandy Cross to Rockville, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Washington, Warrenton, Sparta, Crawfordville, Tignall, White Plains, Norwood, Sharon, Camak, Liberty, Springfield, Delhi, Holliday Park, Powelton, Newtown, Danburg, Shoulderbone, Lyneville, and Ficklin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
